subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: In a Washington Post interview, the former Penn State coach Joe Paterno said he did not know how to handle a report in 2002 of suspected sexual abuse by Jerry Sandusky.
snippet: In a Washington Post interview, the former Penn State coach Joe Paterno said he did not know how to handle a report in 2002 of suspected sexual abuse by Jerry Sandusky.
